div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Organization.description` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4 Organization

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4.

comment.value: Element `Organization.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.meta` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.

Element `Organization.description` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
